title: Witcher III Dev Laying Out Fools - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.20.17
description:
Tim and Greg run through CD Projekt Red's Tweet to end all Tweets.

Thanks to Leesa for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://Leesa.com/kindafunny

:04:25 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   - 
:05:49 - CDProjekt Red Wrecks Shop, via Twitter
:09:39 - Rough Opening for Battlefront II in UK, via GamesIndustry.biz
:19:43 - Mario + Rabbids DLC Leak, via ResetEra
:21:15 - Minecraft Delays Graphics, Switch corssplay, via IGN
:22:09 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   - 32:30
:34:45 - Javier Bonet-Ruiz’s question
:38:18 - Shane Sedlemye’s question
:41:00 - Darby Hallman’s question
:43:42 - Laurier Hébert Jodoin’s question
:45:19 - A concerned citize’s question
:48:56 - Squad Up
:50:04 - You‘re Wrong

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
